participant_1.background:
I want to decorate my home with vintage furniture.
I am a person who loves the cold weather and enjoys living in rural Wisconsin.
I like to dye my hair bright colors, but I have to be careful because of my theater commitments.
I think my brother's job is really cool.
i go to high school.

participant_2.background:
I have many favorite childhood memories, but one that stands out is the time I went swimming in the lake with my family
i am an anime fan.
i often think about quitting my job and becoming a roadie for justin bieber.
I'm looking forward to having more free time now that my siblings are older.
i work as a receptionist at a lawyers office.

content.text: What's your favorite memory from childhood?
I think my favorite memory from childhood was the time I went swimming in the lake with my family.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love swimming in the lakes.
Me too! It's so refreshing and relaxing.
What are some of your interests?
I'm a big fan of anime, and I also like to read and write.
Cool! I've never really gotten into anime, but I've heard good things about it.
You should definitely check it out! There's a lot of great stuff out there.
I'll have to do that. What are some of your favorite animes?
I really like One Piece, Fullmetal Alchemist, and Attack on Titan.
Those are all really popular! I've heard good things about them.
What do you like about anime?
I like the stories, the characters, and the animation.
I see. I'll have to check them out sometime.
